OOC: How in the world canhe just turn off the defenses? 

BIC: 

Maxima cried out in frustration, slamming her fist down.

She then ran over to Megatron, as slightly small as she was, not her normal 
height, she still was able to grab the fusion cannon. Having used it before 
many times, she knew what it could do & how to use it. Hauling it from 
Megatron, gently, there was no way she wanted to trash this piece.. it was 
too important to Megatron. 

She then haulled it over to the entrance of the bridge/command room. 'Would 
be bloody easier if I was in my old form, then it would interface properly,' 
she delt with it as quickly as possible, "For bloody-" thenit started to 
power up, no way it could interface with the Black Hole that Megatron was so 
capable of doing, but she had ran over, grabbed a few cables from Teletran, 
hooked it up to the fusion cannon, & a cable from the recharging bed, this 
feed to the fusion cannon a steady stream of energy that charged the cannon 
up. 

She then waited for the intruders. "I'll be damned if anyone comes in here!" 
She had to protect everyone.. more importantly... she had to protect 
Megatron. 


--part1_b4.1d145cb9.2bf7bf37_boundary
